headline.main: Extrnordinary Case of Needle Maria.; THREE HUNDRED AND EIGHTY-THREE NEEDLES EXTRACTED FROM THE PLESH OF A LADY, AND SHE STILL SURVIVES.

docs.lead_paragraph: Dr. SUMNER Publishes in the Rochester (N. Y.) Union the following account of a singular case of monomania on the part of a young lady. The subject was 19 years of age, of nervous temperament, very healthy, and the daughter of a respectable farmer in Butternutts, Ostego county,
